name: Brix Flood
description:
Introducing our new game series ★Brix Flood★ which comes from the addictive puzzle game series Brix!

Simple but addictive, easy to play but you will be challenged as you progress in hard levels!
Try this mind bugging color puzzle game ★Brix Flood★

It's not like fitting the existing shape of the blocks in dimensions~
Rather a NEW concept game style of color puzzle game upto 6 color patterns!

Flood the colors away now in ★Brix Flood★!


1. What is Brix Flood?

- Combine 6 different colored small boxes into one color whole box to complete the game!

- Be fast and keep the numbers of moves low in order to achieve high score!

- Brix Flood is ★FREE TO PLAY★


2. Game Modes

- Choose from 3 kinds of board sizes S / M / L

- You can adjust the level of difficulty accordingly, and challenge yourself in all sizes of the whole Play Map.

- You can check real-time scores and play statistics.


3. Other Information

- This application will work correctly on iOS 4.0 or later.

- It is recommended to upgrade the OS version to the latest.
